key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on steel and raw materials
Intense market competition in infrastructure and agriculture sectors
controversies: Safety violations cited by the U.S. Department of Labor, including improper rigging equipment and inadequate crane maintenance
Legal challenges related to labor practices, including violations of the National Labor Relations Act

social_issues: Worker safety concerns and labor practice violations
governance_issues: Regulatory challenges and reputational risks from environmental and safety issues
